matches.title: A roof mounted vertical axis wind turbine, inexpensive enough to generate ROI at such a moderate height.
matches.content: Vertical axis design is quieter and makes less noise. Vertical axis design has a smaller profile, can look attractive on rooftops. Vertical axis design doesn't need to rotate to face the wind, reducing costs. Large turbines are few & expensive. Small turbines can be mass produced cheaply. Most turbines are very large to reach faster winds at higher altitudes.  Large turbines in isolated areas have high transmission costs.  This one won't. Large turbines have high transmission costs. A roof mounted system avoids this.
